ValidationRule.description: Pending NBO Product can only set to Accepted or Rejected or Pending or Invalid or Blank (required for Accept some scenario from Outbound Call)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RTL_Status__c),'Pending'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(RTL_Status__c,'Accepted')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(RTL_Status__c,'Rejected')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(RTL_Status__c,'Pending')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(RTL_Status__c,'Invalid')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(RTL_Status__c,'')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Pending NBO Product can only set to Accepted or Rejected
